thread.title: Cathy for Gillian
thread.title_full: DriversEd.com reviewed by Cathy for Gillian

author: Cathy for Gillian
title: Cathy for Gillian
text: This program worked really well for my daughter. I knew she wouldn't want to sit in a classroom all day for 3 Saturdays so decided to try an on-line option. She really liked DriversEd and we're glad because it's MUCH cheaper than the classroom option. She passed the test for her permit with no problems.
